one_reviews_text:
was looking forward to playing this but its just to poorly made, No hand movements its just 2 solid hands so you cant grab anything around you

The scares are really not scares they are so slow 

Maps are poorly designed ie rooms not put together properly and you have gaps everywhere you look

No scenery so when you look out the windows all you see is a white void which takes the realism out of a horror game 

this game could have been alot better but it is very dissapointing 

Sorry for the bad review but i have to tell it how it is.

Dunno why this game only has 2 stars , there are a few bugs but they dont interrup the gameplay really , had a couple of jumpscares and scary noises. only thing that was sometimes annoying is that theres no smooth turning , u wanna go left u have to turn left in real. also the real turning sometimes didnt let me go up stairs or pass walls. but after trying a couple of times it worked and i could go on. if the minor bugs are fixed and smooth turning as hands moving , (now ur hands dont move , just like 2 plates floating arround,) is added then this game will be a very good horror walking experience.

ok iwas gonna get this for my brother to scare him but while i was watching he wasent scared at all                                                                                                                                               


when i got home to play this game it was boring the jumpscares absoluty boring i remember being freaked at first but it got a little fun then got borin


if your looking for a horror game this isnt your type your looking for     well if you want to get idc im just saying


by the way its kind fun not really  boring to but i guess its worth the money
